DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare lumbar proprioception patient chronic back pain healthy volunteer low- high-frequency muscle vibration . The order measure ( low frequency vibration , high frequency vibration vibration ) randomize cross-over design . Patients volunteer match age body mass index .
DOC.brief_title: Lumbar Proprioception Lower Back Pain Patients Versus Healthy Subjects : Comparative Study Effects Low- High-frequency Muscle Vibrations
DOC.detailed_description: The secondary objective study : A-Measure effect low- high-frequency vibration lumbar reposition patient chronic low back pain . B-Measure effect low- high-frequency vibration lumbar reposition healthy volunteer . Our work hypothesis low frequency vibration induce illusion shortening , high frequency vibration induce illusion elongation . The variability error increase .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria patient : The patient must give his/her inform sign consent The patient must insure beneficiary health insurance plan The patient chronic low back pain ( NOT originate postoperative set ) least 6 month Inclusion Criteria healthy volunteer : The subject must give his/her inform sign consent The subject must insure beneficiary health insurance plan Exclusion Criteria patient : The patient judicial protection , kind guardianship The patient refuse sign consent It impossible correctly inform patient The patient pregnant , parturient , breastfeed The patient history spinal surgery The patient history preexist postural disorder precede low back pain The patient treat last month ( e.g . back pain injection ) The patient balance disorder , blindness , inability perform experimental protocol Exclusion Criteria healthy volunteer : The subject judicial protection , kind guardianship The subject refuse sign consent It impossible correctly inform subject The subject pregnant , parturient , breastfeed The subject history spinal surgery The subject history preexist postural disorder precede low back pain The subject treat last month ( e.g . back pain injection ) The subject balance disorder , blindness , inability perform experimental protocol The subject history acute low back pain > 15 day result leave work 7 day 5 year precede study
